doc.field: Series II: Communist Party Writings [Division II: My Writings (Portfolios 16 - 25)]:
Series II: Communist Party Writings [Division II: My Writings (Portfolios 16 - 25)]:

Writings after the appearance in the USA in May, 1945 [...of the Duclos letter] between the summer of 1946 through February, 1948, and ending with my "Open letter to the membership of the Communist Party of the U.S.A." (enclosed)
